demo.Zhihao.Server

Class Jabber

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • demo.Zhihao.Server.Jabber
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

     class Jabber
extends java.lang.Thread
    This is used to redirect the messages sent to the server to all the clients that connecting to the server.
    The protocol used to receive the messages is UDP, whereas the protocol used to send messages is TCP.
    This class also do some process to the messages received.
    Author:
    ben
